name: ScreenSaverView
desc: An abstract class that defines the interface for subclassers to interact with the screen saver infrastructure.

items.name: init?(frame: NSRect, isPreview: Bool)
items.desc: Initializes a newly allocated ScreenSaverView with frame as its frame rectangle, and sets the value returned by isPreview to isPreview.

items.name: class func backingStoreType() -> NSWindow.BackingStoreType
items.desc: Returns the desired backing store for windows in which the screen saver view will be instantiated.

items.name: class func performGammaFade() -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the screen saver application should perform a gradual screen fade when it starts and stops the animation.

items.name: var animationTimeInterval: TimeInterval
items.desc: Sets the time interval between animation frames.

items.name: func startAnimation()
items.desc: Activates the periodic timer that animates the screen saver.

items.name: func animateOneFrame()
items.desc: Advances the screen saverâ€™s animation by a single frame.

items.name: func stopAnimation()
items.desc: Deactivates the timer that advances the animation.

items.name: var isAnimating: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the screen saver is currently animating.

items.name: var isPreview: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the screen saver view was created in a size appropriate for use as a preview.

items.name: var hasConfigureSheet: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the screen saver has an associated configuration sheet.

items.name: var configureSheet: NSWindow?
items.desc: Returns the window containing all of the controls to be used for configuring the screen saver.
